.@HouseDemocrats are taking action to lower costs by making more in America. 

We're continuing the bicameral, bipartisan work to send the historic, cost-cutting, ‚Äúmake-it-in-America,‚Äù anti-inflation, America COMPETES Act to the President‚Äôs desk.

America is confronting a rising tide of gun violence, from Uvalde to Buffalo to countless communities across our country. 

It's time to #EndGunViolence & @HouseDemocrats are committed to saving lives with critical gun violence prevention legislation. https://t.co/egMMaMRLKr

Here in South Florida we know the importance of our water infrastructure. I'm proud to support #WRDA2022 because it:

57 years ago #OTD, Griswold v. Connecticut established the right to privacy & gave married couples the freedom to choose whether & when to bring a child into the world. 

With those rights at risk today, Congress must #FundTitleX & protect access to family planning care.

Reminder for parents & guardians: free breakfast and lunch will be available for children throughout the summer at various schools and libraries in #PBC.

Find the complete list of locations and times below: https://t.co/qdCeM0GF0B

More horrific shootings this weekend at a graduation party, mall, & on a busy street. We can't continue to let #gunviolence destroy any more communities. 

This week, we are voting on gun violence prevention legislation, it's time for Congress to act. https://t.co/8sjZCBcrOm

We #WearOrange to honor the victims & survivors of gun violence. Today on Gun Violence Awareness Day, I am thinking about the children & teachers murdered in #Uvalde, and here in Parkland. 

It‚Äôs time to take action & work to #EndGunViolence.
Wishing Dr. Jill Biden a very happy birthday! Thank you for your dedication to students as an educator & now as @FLOTUS.

Hurricane season is here & we're already seeing storms form. Don't wait until the last minute to be ready. Check @PBCDEM for updates & guidance.

You can also find more hotlines & information in the hurricane guide here: https://t.co/MEBWVIZxjM

Men are more likely than women to smoke, drink too much alcohol, make unhealthy or risky choices, & put off regular checkups & medical care.

This #MensHealthMonth, take action to lead a healthy lifestyle. Find tips & resources below: https://t.co/ZZn04hbK71 https://t.co/alZGvE2RUh
Good luck in the #RolandGarros semi-final, @CocoGauff! #PBC is cheering you on. https://t.co/9F5Or0ezXS
